text: Dale Edward Wolf (September 6, 1924 - March 20, 2021) was an American businessman and politician. He was born in Wilmington, Delaware. He was veteran of World War II. Wolf was a member of the Republican Party. For three weeks, he was the 70th Governor of Delaware.*Delaware Historical Society; website ; 505 North Market Street, Wilmington, Delaware 19801; (302) 655-7161 Wolf died on March 20, 2021 in Wilmington, Delaware at the age of 96. ==References== ==Other websites== *Biographical Directory of the Governors of the United States *Biography by Russell Pickett *Delaware's Governor's *Political Graveyard *Emerald BioAgriculture Company *Stand Up for what is Right and Just Category:1924 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Governors of Delaware Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Businesspeople from Wilmington, Delaware Category:Businesspeople from Nebraska Category:Politicians from Wilmington, Delaware Category:Politicians from Nebraska Category:Lieutenant Governors of Delaware
title: Dale E. Wolf
